sources.title: The Legend of Bigfoot (1975)
sources.description: A documentary about the legendary creature, Bigfoot, with emphasis on him being the missing link. Watch on RetroFlix:¬† https://retroflix.org/the-legend-of-bigfoot-1975/

sources.title: The Legend of Bigfoot (1975) Documentary
sources.description:
Startling motion picture footage of the elusive creature!
A documentary about the legendary creature, Bigfoot, with emphasis on him being the missing link.

Director: Harry Winer 
Writers: Harry Winer, Paula Labrot
Stars: Ivan Marx, Peggy Marx, Yukon Frida
Genres: Classics, Cult, Documentary, Drama

00:00 Full Film
00:17 üë£ A man named Ivan Marx shares his experiences with Bigfoot, including sightings and evidence of footprints.
10:32 üë£ A man encounters footprints and other evidence of Bigfoot in the wilderness, leading to a search for the creature.
33:34 üîé The video discusses the search for Bigfoot and the evidence found during the journey.
43:41 üîç The narrator investigates Bigfoot sightings in Alaska and learns about the creature's connection to the native people.
53:32 üîç The narrator explores the wilderness in search of Bigfoot and observes various Alaskan animals.
1:05:57 üìπ A researcher sets up cameras in a beaver pond to capture footage of Bigfoot and successfully obtains irrefutable proof of its existence.


@CultCinemaClassics¬†

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
